title: Pokémon Home Details Announced - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.28.20
description:
Thanks to G.I. Joe: War on Cobra for sponsoring us today! Download G.I. Joe: War on Cobra right now for FREE on your mobile device and choose a side for battle. Please use the link http://www.d3go.com/KFGames to download the game and receive your free Bazooka and Missile B.A.T. character in the game. Free gift is for new players 

Get a free stock today by going to http://games.robinhood.com

Blessing and Imran run through some of the new details of Pokemon Home along with discussing the rumored Resident Evil 8. 

Time Stamps - 
00:07:40 - Housekeeping
Our first impressions video of Patapon 2 Remastered is now up on Youtube.com/KindaFunn                                                                          yGames
We also have a new episode of PS I Love You XOXO available on Youtube and streaming services
Speaking of PS I Love You, the shirts are currently sold out but should be back in stock within a few weeks.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:
Black Jack and Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:10:10 - Pokémon Home details are out, this is from Nicole Carpenter over at Polygon
00:19:39 - A Witcher Spin-off game Is Now Available on Nintendo Switch Worldwide, this is from Francesco De Meo of wccftech
00:24:15 - Nintendo Mobile Games Reach $1 Billion in Lifetime Player Spending, this is by Katie Williams of Sensortower
00:32:55 -Did Respawn just murder the new Apex Legends guy?, this is from Austen Goslin of Polygon
00:41:42 -Resident Evil 8 May be First-Person Again, this is from Nathan Birch of wccftech
00:48:55 - Out today
00:53:05 -   GI JOE: War on Cobra
00:55:21 - Robinhood
 Reader mail   -
00:56:25 - Do you guys have any tips for conventions or tournaments to stay clean and healthy? - The Nano Biologist
01:02:30 - What's happening with Stadia? - GroovyMuse
01:11:45 - Squad Up:Brian(Xbox) - BigTen68
01:12:10 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Tim
